0.ContentPack: This pack includes a bag full of sweets

1.ContentPack: this low-priced pack includes a bag of sweets plus an organized hotel welcome

2.ContentPack: This pack comes with the reglamentari bag of sweets, the organized hotel welcome and a parking area

3.ContentPack: In this pack you will find an exquisite selection of sweets, a welcome, a parking area and an exclusive coupon with 5% of discount in the next in the next purchase

4.ContentPack: With this pack, you have a visit to a sweet shop and a coupon in said store with a value of up to 20€, a welcome from the hotel, a parking area and acces VIP to a local disco

5.ContentPack: In the Tier 5 Pack you will find the visit to a sweet shop with a coupon valuated up to 40€, a welcome from the hotel, a parking area, a VIP acces in the local disco and a coupon for a local restaurant with a value up to 35%
